basics.name: Eric Stasney
basics.label: Developer and Analyst
basics.summary:
I enjoy working the full-stack of a data problem. Data cleaning, curation, visualization and engineering.
I Leverage statistics and machine learning to solve problems. Deliver consumable solutions to stakeholders with dashboards, reports and most recently, web applications

work.name: Cisco
work.summary: Talent Hub is a small team performing critical functions for Talent Acquisition Operations
highlights: Develop NLP Pipeline with domain specific language normalization
Research and implement matrix decomposition solvers for latent factor analysis
Develop React.js annotation software to support NLP efforts
Develop Chrome Extension for collaborative aggregation of public data
Develop and published a company name disambiguation Python package
Adapted, Optimized and Documented research paper MATLAB code that implements hierarchical NMF
Visualize and share findings with web technologies (D3.js, Flask, etc)
Use PdfMiner, Regex and pattern recognition to parse contact information from PDFs.

work.name: US Army / COARNG
work.summary: Enlisted in CO Army National Guard with the intent to serve my community, part-time. My unit was activated and I served 18-months of Active Duty.

work.name: Seven Step RPO
work.summary: Qualify candidates by conducting phone interviews to ensure technical and cultural match to client needs

work.name: Edwards Student Housing & American Campus Communities
work.summary: Travelled between company properties to supervise and audit property operations

projects.name: hNMF
highlights: Adapted research paper MATLAB code to implement hNMF with Python
Scikit-learn compatible and reduced run-time from hours to seconds
Added several convenience methods that make transforming matrices to latent factors trivial
Documented with Sphinx and published with rtd-style documentation

projects.name: Percy
highlights: 2nd round selection in Cisco's Innovate Everywhere Challenge
Given a body of text, uses Pagerank algorithm to identify central topics. The result is returned and displayed in a D3.js force-directed graph.
Locates the 'most discriminating' words in a document by referencing domain specific word probabilities. Provides insights into building efficient and relevant searches.
Showcases word embeddings with a 'This + That' page. E.g. (Hardware + Storage) returns SAN, Storage Area Networks, NAS, etc

projects.name: Web Scraper
projects.description: Web scraper for internal team use
highlights: Scraper exists of two main components : a Chrome Extension and Web Application
Tracks extractions and prevents usage over a limit set by an administrator
Manages extraction target lists to fetch only unseen data
Parses raw strings into structured data. Transforms data into spreadsheet form compatible with internal ATS.
Builds word clouds based on word frequency from extractions
Integrates with contact enrichment providers
